layer.name: Skill
layer.definition: The ability to do something well; expertise. Not just doing something, but developing competence — getting better through deliberate practice and feedback.

questions.text: I can recognize early warning signs that something is off in my health — I've developed body awareness and diagnostic skill.
I know how to communicate effectively with healthcare providers — I can describe symptoms, ask good questions, and advocate for myself.
I understand how body, soul, and spirit interact in my own experience — I can trace connections and address root causes.
I have practical knowledge of preventive care — I know what screenings, practices, and habits maintain health proactively.
I can make informed health decisions — I have enough knowledge to evaluate options and choose wisely.
